ygData.subject: Re: spell slots
ygData.msgSnippet: You are missing a good point with Tashan though, and that is te use it has for other mages.  If you lower resistance, then things like lightening from wizards
ygData.messageBody:
You are missing a good point with Tashan though, and that is te use it
has for other mages. If you lower resistance, then things like
lightening from wizards hits a lot better, druids in my parties love it
when I tashan, casue they average more damage as well.


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim Borelli [SMTP:timb@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 9:46 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] spell slots
>
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> i believe it is level 20 or 24. i may start using it then, but i have
> never
> had a need for it. the group i am with all the time has 2 monk tanks,
> a
> paladin, me and a cleric. i weaken the MOBs, root them, charm them if
> need
> be, and cast choke on them, and let them do the rest. many a time i
> have
> meditated for most of the battle. when i solo i wont use it for the
> mere
> mana waste (jmaybe at higher levels there is more of a reason to, but
> i
> suspect i wont be able to soo higher lvl MOBs as easily as i can now,
> so
> i'll be grouped a lot more).
>
> Qorona of the Volition Guild, 17th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
>
> At 09:39 AM 5/11/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
> >
> >What level is Tashan II? I remember seeing it mentioned here that
> someone
> >has seen it in-game. Maybe you would have better luck with that...
> >
